title: NIGHTSPORT v2.1 for WatchMaker
summary: NIGHTSPORT v 2.1 : Digital watch face with Stopwatch and Night Mode
description: NIGHTSPORT v2.1Features:New in v2.1• New UI layout • Custom colors are now controlled by pressing Backlight• Stopwatch by pressing Stopwatch • Weather by pressing WeatherNew to v2:•Customizable Day mode by tapping Time•Customizable Night mode by tapping Night •Time•Date•Stopwatch•Nightmode•Dual ambient mode (Day/Night)
descriptionHTML:
NIGHTSPORT v2.1


Features:

New in v2.1

• New UI layout
• Custom colors are now controlled by pressing Backlight
• Stopwatch by pressing Stopwatch
• Weather by pressing Weather

New to v2:
•Customizable Day mode by tapping Time
•Customizable Night mode by tapping Night

•Time
•Date
•Stopwatch
•Nightmode
•Dual ambient mode (Day/Night)
recentChanges: • Custom colors are now controlled by pressing Backlight
• Custom Day Mode Colors by tapping Time
• Custom Night Mode by tapping Night
